info.name: Oldschool Runescape
info.description: this style hides all forums besides oldschool and support. it also moves the support forum below oldschool forum . this allows for easier access to the oldschool forums . also changes the background for easier reading of some forums
info.additionalInfo:
V2.0 fixed a problem where when you started a new thread the blue(rs3) background appeared.
fixed problem where if a thread / forum didnt have a second page or more the bottom nav buttons would seem to flow above the nav bar.
fixed a problem where a random background image appeard to be floating above the nav menu.
